headline: Franklin Templeton Makes Bold Private Credit Move With Apera Acquisition — Making Its Next Big Bet in Alternatives
summary: Franklin Resources Inc. (NYSE:BEN), operating as Franklin Templeton, recently closed on its acquisition of Apera Asset Management. The deal augments the global investment management company's alternatives platform and increases its presence in ...
